title: This Role's Post Number Is Prime

fields.name: Twitch Prime Sub (Passive):
fields.value: Every time you attack, your Attack Power is set to the the next following prime number x0.1 (0.3x -> 0.5x -> 0.7x -> etc.)

fields.name: Prime Targets (Charge 73%):
fields.value: Attacks on roles with a prime number as the respective post number deal 1.3x more damage.

fields.name: Prime Time (Passive):
fields.value: Have an extra vote on prime-numbered Day Phases.
